text: Nza fov, mba keman maaŋgiap ndai. Nza ndaim, bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ guigira kɨvgiap nza daim, mba kem mbarara ndaim, rari mbari vhɨzgi. Mba keman ŋgari gumgi khaŋ tɨgap ŋgarav, nza nda vov, Nidus ŋgu bakɨme han mbaim, bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ maaŋ nza thɨvigim, nza naangen mbovara thav, wari vov, Krit rɨgɨkɨrigen zɨn kɨrar mueŋ nderen Sarmone nɨmane gaara tɨga ndai.
